channel.title: [317] Chat to all players [317]
channel.description:
Here's the deal, I found this tut on Wednesday September 16 (yesterday) that showed this cool tool that comes up when you click on run.bat. But it wasn't here today so I'm posting this server help thing.
Here is a pic of it: [img]http://Control Pannel v2[/img] If that pic doesn't work here is a link: [url=http://s916.photobucket.com/albums/ad2/gfbfbfgf/?action=view&current=ControlPannelv2.jpg]http://s916.photobucket.com/albums/ad2/gfbfbfgf/?action=view&current=ControlPannelv2.jpg[/url]
See where it says "Yell to Server"? When I click that nothing happens... But when I click "Update in 2 min" or "Kick all", they work! So if you can help.. Please do. ;)

item.title: [317] Chat to all players [317]
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“qawsedrftgyhujikol, post:1, topic:302926”]Here’s the deal, I found this tut on Wednesday September 16 (yesterday) that showed this cool tool that comes up when you click on run.bat. But it wasn’t here today so I’m posting this server help thing.

Here is a pic of it:

If that pic doesn’t work here is a link:
http://s916.photobucket.com/albums/ad2/gfbfbfgf/?action=view&current=ControlPannelv2.jpg

See where it says “Yell to Server”?
When I click that nothing happens…
But when I click “Update in 2 min” or “Kick all”, they work!
So if you can help… Please do. ;)[/quote]
Just add a ::yell command to your server.

Read full topic
